title: Alibaba Leads $140 Million Funding Round in X Square Robot
description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. co-led the latest funding round in robotics startup X Square Robot, as the Chinese e-commerce company is trying to cement its leadership in emerging technologies.

title: September Deluge Signals Rainy Autumn for Drought-Hit UK
description: Early-September downpours have drenched many Londoners, foreshadowing what forecasters say could be a soggier-than-usual autumn, but that probably won’t be enough to lift the UK’s drought.

title: CEOs Eyeing Tech Deals Record Flock to Key Goldman Confab
description: CEOs, investors, analysts and even some bankers gathering for one of the tech industry’s biggest summits this week in San Francisco will likely spend time whispering about how 2025 could go down as the best year ever for deals in their sector.
